attributes.action: Kingston communications should allow other providers in the area.
attributes.background:
For to long now, KC have held the monopoly   in the hull area and this is not fair. Their are many better deals out their, but if you live in hull we are only allowed to use KC.
This has to change now.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Kingston Communications is a private company and the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for its operation or the operations of other service providers.
